programme.desc: Shari just moved back to D.C. after a breakup and hopes to start painting again. Inspiration hits when she meets Evan, a repairman who winds up actually being a gallery owner.

programme.desc: After three years of organizing fashion collections at a top magazine, Lauren is passed up for a promotion and decides it is finally time to throw in the towel and move home.

programme.desc: Andie is devastated by the accidental death of a patient, but as she and the grieving mother overcome their sorrow through forgiveness, they soon learn that acceptance leads to hope.

programme.desc: As she bounces between temporary jobs, an optimistic woman and her jaded neighbor discover the beauty of New York City together.

programme.desc: A Los Angeles event coordinator learns that her estranged uncle has recently passed away and left her a chalet in Vail, Colo.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose becomes convinced she is dead after suffering an esophageal spasm; after this experience she decides to live for the day.

programme.title: Eat, Play, Love
programme.desc: Veterinarian Dr. Carly Monroe secretly loves Dan, the owner of a dog shelter. Unfortunately, Dan is about to marry his glamorous girlfriend and move to New York.

programme.title: Sailing Into Love
programme.desc: A biology teacher juggles her duties as bridesmaid to three friends, as well as teaching a summer enrichment class at her favorite place in the world.

programme.title: Where Your Heart Belongs
programme.desc: When a marketing executive returns home to help with her best friend's wedding, she learns the hard way that love and support from family and friends means more than she'd ever imagined.

programme.title: Winter Love Story
programme.desc: When author Cassie's first novel isn't selling, she is paired on a book tour with author Elliot to boost her sales - but along the way, a romance starts to blossom.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.title: Christmas with the Singhs
programme.desc: Newly engaged Asha Singh and Jake O'Brien are excited to spend Christmas together, but their relationship is tested when their families' cultural and holiday traditions clash.
